document.full_text: "american idol" made simon cowell a household name in the united states, but the prickly british music svengali is hitting some flat notes as he tries to launch his own tv singing competition.
document.title: cheryl cole not the only sour note for cowell's "x factor"
lines_and_colors: "american idol" made simon cowell a household name in the united states, but the prickly british music svengali is hitting some flat notes as he tries to launch his own tv singing competition.
